actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

official_title: To provide that the percentage of total apportionments of funds allocated to any State from the Highway Trust Fund in any fiscal year be at least 95 percent of the percentage of estimated tax payments paid into the Highway Trust Fund which are attributable to highway users in such State in the latest fiscal year for which data is available.

summary.text: Changes the percentage of total apportionments of funds allocated to a State from the Highway Trust Fund in specified fiscal years from 85 percent to 95 percent of the percentage of estimated tax payments paid into such Fund which are attributable to highway users in such State in the latest fiscal year for which data is available.

titles.title: To provide that the percentage of total apportionments of funds allocated to any State from the Highway Trust Fund in any fiscal year be at least 95 percent of the percentage of estimated tax payments paid into the Highway Trust Fund which are attributable to highway users in such State in the latest fiscal year for which data is available.
